sentences.en: As long as I deliver the goods, my boss is very happy.
sentences.cn: 只要我做好本职工作，我的老板就很高兴。

sentences.en: He was a happy child who rarely cried.
sentences.cn: 他是一个快乐的孩子，很少哭鼻子。

sentences.en: He was happy to book into the Royal Pavilion Hotel.
sentences.cn: 他很高兴能入住圣庭苑酒店。

sentences.en: He was so happy communing with the dolphin in Dingle Bay.
sentences.cn: 他在丁格尔湾与海豚交流的时候特别开心。

sentences.en: Her grandmother had the gift of making people happy.
sentences.cn: 她奶奶有逗人开心的本事。

sentences.en: I loved her and thought I could make her happy.
sentences.cn: 我爱她，我想我能让她幸福快乐。

sentences.en: I should be happy if you would bring them this evening.
sentences.cn: 如果今晚你将他们带来的话，我会很高兴。

sentences.en: I wasn't too happy with what I'd written so far.
sentences.cn: 我对于目前已写完的这些并不太满意。

sentences.en: I'll be happy to answer any questions if there are any.
sentences.cn: 如果有问题，我很乐意回答。

sentences.en: I’ve never felt happier in my life.
sentences.cn: 我一生从未感到如此快乐。

sentences.en: If you are not happy about a repair, go back and complain.
sentences.cn: 如果你对修理效果不满意，可以再找他们投诉。

sentences.en: If you think I'm happy with what's left, you're very wrong.
sentences.cn: 如果你认为我对剩下的很满意，那你就大错特错了。

sentences.en: It’s a lovely house and we’ve been very happy here.
sentences.cn: 房子很漂亮，我们住在这里非常开心。

sentences.en: Like the best stories, this one may yet have a happy end.
sentences.cn: 就像最精彩的故事那样，这个故事也许仍会有个美好的结局。

sentences.en: She had few friends, and was generally not very happy.
sentences.cn: 她几乎没什么朋友，总的来说不怎么开心。

sentences.en: She led a normal, happy life with her sister and brother.
sentences.cn: 她和弟弟妹妹一起过着平凡而幸福的生活。

sentences.en: the happy faces of the children
sentences.cn: 孩子们快乐的表情

sentences.en: The whole idea was to give history a happy gloss.
sentences.cn: 整个想法就是要粉饰历史。

sentences.en: This has been the happiest day of my life.
sentences.cn: 这是我一生中最快乐的一天。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, this happy story finishes on a more sombre note.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，这个快乐的故事结局却比较伤感。

sentences.en: We are both so happy, you have no idea.
sentences.cn: 你肯定想象不出来，我们俩都这么幸福。

words.tran_cn: 快乐地；幸福地；幸运地；恰当地

快乐的节日；愉快的假期
n. 快乐时间；减价供应饮料等的时间（酒吧间术语）

trans.tran_cn: 幸福的，快乐的，巧妙的，〈口〉有点醉意的
trans.tran_en: having feelings of pleasure, for example because something good has happened to you or you are very satisfied with your life
